question: On which riverbanks is the center of Uppsala, Sweden located?
true_answer: The center is located on both banks of the Fyris River (Fyrisån)
asked_question_translated: Na katerem bregu je središče švedskega mesta Uppsala?
answer: Središče švedskega mesta Uppsala se nahaja na zahodnem bregu reke Fyrisån.
answer_translated_eng: The centre of Uppsala, Sweden, is located on the west bank of the Fyrisån River.
